LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_CIWS.label: APT shell
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Dawnblade.label: armor piercing shell
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Kord.label: uranium APT shell
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.label: Type 85 Multi-Purpose-Quick-Firing System
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.description: An automated artillery system widely used on small to medium-sized frigates and corvettes in colonial fleets.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Type 85 Multi-Purpose-Quick-Firing System
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_GateKeeper.label: Gatekeeper
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_GateKeeper.description: A large-caliber multi-barreled autocannon, also known as the GAU-8 "Avenger". Its an ancient practical design with an extremely high rate of fire and a devastating effect on anything unfortunate enough to stand infront of it.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.verbs.Verb_ShootCE.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_MK44_Navy.label: MK44 BushMaster-II
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_MK44_Navy.description: The 30x173mm MK44 Bushmaster II autocannon, despite its modest 200 RPM rate of fire, achieves reliable defensive performance through good accuracy and adequate lethality.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_MK44_Navy.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: MK44 BushMaster-II
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.label: 2B9M vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.description: An ancient design of rapid fire indirect artillery piece capabler of firing four mortar rounds in one burst.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: 2B9M vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.label: Dawnblade
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.description:
MPQFS-85 "Dawnblade" is an onboard multi-role quick-firing cannon system. It uses drum magazines and an automatic revolver loader to permit a high rate of sustained fire.
The armor plating has been removed to allow emplacement to be redeployed as needed for heavy fire support.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.comps.CompRefuelabl: Cannot fire: Needs new reinforced barrel.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.label: Gatekeeper
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.description: A large-caliber multi-barreled machine gun turret typically used on spacecraft and maritime ships. It has an extremely high rates of fire and devastating suppression capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.comps.CompRefuelab: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_MK44_Navy.label: MK44 BushMaster-II
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_MK44_Navy.description: The 30x173mm MK44 Bushmaster II autocannon, despite its modest 200 RPM rate of fire, achieves reliable defensive performance through good accuracy and adequate lethality.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_MK44_Navy.comps.CompRefuelabl: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.label: Okhotnik
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.description: An ancient design of a remote controlled turret widely used on armored vehicles and mech armor platforms.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.comps.CompRefuelable: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Sentry.label: Sentry turret
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Sentry.description: A quick-deployed, disposable remote-controlled turret that can be used continuously for about 12 hours after being deployed. It will automatically shut down after the energy is used up. These type of equipments are usually deployed in urban combat environments to ambush enemies.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Sentry.comps.CompMechPowerCel: This turret has a limited battery life. Once it runs out, it will stop working entirely.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Vasilek.label: Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Vasilek.description: An ancient design of a rapid fire indirect artillery piece capable of firing four mortar rounds in one burst.
Cannot fire: Needs new reinforced barrel.
